quotes: The ability to hold two competing thoughts in one's mind and still be able to function is the mark of a superior mind.

Do not allow your inner doubts to keep you from achieving what you can do.
Though no one can go back and make a brand new start, anyone can start from now and make a brand new ending.

You talk when you cease to be at peace with your thoughts.

The power of human thought grows exponentially with the number of minds that share that thought.
Life is not always a matter of holding good cards, but sometimes, playing a poor hand well.
All cruelty springs from weakness.
Care about what other people think and you will always be their prisoner.
Make your stand today. On this spot. On this day.

Charms strike the sight, but merit wins the soul.
